header.#text:
Treasury report
			 on information sharing barriers with respect to identity theft

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: (or the

) shall review whether current Federal tax laws and regulations related
			 to the confidentiality and disclosure of return information prevent the
			 effective enforcement of local, State, and Federal identity theft statutes. The
			 review shall consider whether greater information sharing between the

and State and local law enforcement authorities would improve
			 the enforcement of criminal laws at all levels of government.
